Item.Data: <RuleCollection Type="EXE" EnforcementMode="Enabled"><FilePathRule Id="e9ae4398-5576-4863-a11e-5e3ea3c374c5" Name="Default_Allow_*" Description="Allow All" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"><Conditions><FilePathCondition Path="*"/></Conditions></FilePathRule></RuleCollection>
